attributes.action: release all information within the possession of HM Government relating to a deal, made between 1986 and 1988, to sell GEC (UK) engines to Iraq, to extend the range of their SCUD-B missiles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
This information ought to be dealth with under the Freedom of Information Act.
http://www.number10.gov.uk/output/Page7035.asp
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
